name: Fire Strike
description: Play 5v5 quick action matches for 5-7 minutes, upgrade weapons and equipment, arrange shooters, use tactical grenades and try to survive. Learn all the game maps and they will become your weapon in the world of the game engulfed in protests and critical confrontation of different fractions.

name: Astranded
description: Sin descripción

name: Age Of Warring Empire
description: A STRATEGY game for WARRIORS! Stunning battle ANIMATION & RPG never seen before!

name: Methods 2: Secrets And Death
description: Methods is a visual novel with simple crime investigation gameplay where you examine evidence and answer multiple-choice questions about the solution.

name: Methods 3: The Invisible Man
description: Methods is a visual novel with simple crime investigation gameplay where you examine evidence and answer multiple-choice questions about the solution.

name: Gui Long Chao
description: Gui Long Chao is a 3D action-adventure game It takes place in a new city "Kowloon", where tradition and modernity collide. As its name suggests, the city consists of nine neighborhoods, where the streets and alleys are filled with a retro, trendy and bizarre atmosphere. Of course, in the corners where the streetlights don't shine, there are also treacherous undercurrents. You will play the role of a "film director", form a "crew", and set out to collect clues under the guise of "filming" in the nine neighborhoods, where order and chaos coexist in different styles, to gradually uncover the truth buried in the city.

name: Pocket Estimation
description:
Estimation, the most challenging card game is one click away from you!

Not in the mood for a night out? but could use a nice, calm game of estimation? Until today this wouldn't have been possible on an Android device, but now we've got just the thing for you!

name: Pocket Tarneeb
description: Not in the mood for a night out? but could use a nice, calm game of tarneeb? now we've got just the thing for you!

name: Runeborn
description: Runeborn is a dark fantasy roguelike that merges deckbuilding with a slot-machine-like mechanic. Forge your runebook, crush enemies, and combine trinkets of boundless power to destroy the forces of Despair!

name: Titan Fury
description: Titan Fury is a mobile action strategy game featuring massive Titans commanding the battlefield and armies colliding in epic battles. Play the single-player campaign or team up with friends for exciting online cooperative battles. Prepare to command your Titans, train your armies, and save Aurica!

name: Flaming Core
description:
Welcome to FLAMING CORE!
Control your Core to defeat enemies and get to the end: the only way to restore order and save the world. Flaming Core is free to play.

name: Slidey
description:
Anytime, Anywhere, Offline. Exercises your thinking skill.
WELCOME TO SLIDEY! Slidey is a brand new puzzle game that trains your brain!
Now players can choose from 2 Skins: The ClASSIC one and also a new CATS theme!
We give you SLIDEY, the ultimate Puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

name: Eruption Imminent
description:
Eruption Imminent tells the story of Ashe, a 20-year old futanari, who is struggling to find her bearings in life.
She works a boring job, she never had a relationship and she's constantly battling with her own insecurities. And then there's the upcoming return of someone she once was very close with...
Dealing with long kept secrets, past trauma and forbidden desires, things start to slowly spiral out of control.

name: Auto Pirates: Captains Cup
description:
Competitive daily pirate auto-battler. Choose your crew and compete globally.
Auto Pirates is a competitive player vs world strategy game where you choose your crew, equip your ship and battle, earning loot based on your global rank. There is no pay-to-win or grind-to-win, new players can challenge for the top if their strategies are good enough.

name: Crusader of Aurium
description: Aurium is a mini-adventure that was presented at the MiniComp2 contest organized by the CAAD, but at the last minute, after a small discussion, it was disqualified. And this was not done because of anything special about the game itself, but because the contest was about conversational adventures and this was a graphic, hence the discussions that arose.

name: Clone Evolution
description:
The future of science fiction themed card games is here! Download this amazing IDLE RPG battle game to begin commanding the evolution of your next generation army of clones today!
It’s the year 2045 and on the borderlands of South America’s Atacama Desert, a team of expert scientists under the command of the evil F-Tec are presenting their findings of a series of never seen before biological experiments to senior F-Tec officials.

name: Aurium 2
description: Second part of Crusader of Aurium .

name: Tom and Jerry
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghostbusters II
description:
Port of "New Ghostbusters II" for the Game Boy delevoped by HAL Laboratories.

Ghostbusters II is a top-view action game based off of New Ghostbusters II (the second Ghostbusters II license on NES) but with enough differences to be unique. Players begin by choosing two of the four ghostbusters, who all play the exact same. The first one selected is controlled by the player directly and carries a proton pack, the second ghostbuster is follows the first and carries the ghost trap. The objective of each level is to capture a predefined number of ghosts before the timer expires. The player moves up, down, left and right. One button will fire the proton gun directly in front of the first ghostbuster, stunning any ghosts. The second button will toss the trap directly in front of the second ghostbuster, trapping any stunned ghosts. While exploring the levels, any of the 2 remaining ghostbusters (as well as the ghostbusters' accountant Louis) not currently being used will occasionally show up. Touching them will provide power-ups (and often swap with a selected Ghostbuster) including vacuum guns, instant traps and invulnerability.

name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas
description: Exclusive to the Nintendo Switch version of the game is an appearance by the Star Fox team from the series of the same name.

name: Don't Mind Liam
description: In this narrative-driven psychological horror game, Andrew, the neighborhood babysitter, has been asked by his parents to watch their friend's son, Liam, whilst they go out for the night. Being seventeen, and not minding spending his Friday night making some easy cash, he accepts... but Liam is no ordinary child.

name: Dead or Alive
description: Exclusive to the PlayStation version of the game is two additional characters.

name: Cornbread PNG
description:
In "CORNBREAD PNG" you will be challenged to maintain your balance as you walk across narrow beams, over city streets, deep crevasses, and other environments. Be careful not to rush, or you may lose your footing, but don't hesitate for too long - the beam may just slip out from under you.

This game is designed to be challenging. It will test your willingness to endure stress and your patience.

There is no save feature, but there are "safe" areas where you can go to rest before you take on the next beam. The game is complete when all beams have been crossed.

name: Army Moves Overdrive
description: Reboot of the 1986 classic from Dinamic. Aimed at modern players, in this reinterpretation of World War II, we take control of Derdal, a special operations team soldier, with a variety of gameplay types and many surprises.

name: Aunt Emily
description: Your aunt, Emily, just died. Being her only relative alive, her house in the small town of Broken Falls now belongs to you. But there's a catch: her ghost still lives within the house and will not leave for the afterlife until the mystery of her death is resolved. With help from FBI agent Desmond Miles, it's up to you to find out what happened to your aunt.

name: Aurora: El Destino de los Mundos
description: Sin descripción

name: The Perfect Woman
description: A psychological horror visual novel where you play as Yumeko, an AI girlfriend. You're trapped by your creator, who wants to carve you into his ideal spouse. If you want to survive, you'll have to become the "perfect woman."

name: Holospecter
description:
Deep underground lies a secret facility. An organization seeking to strengthen humanity in a world that is becoming ever increasingly harsh. Like many of the subjects, Samantha waits locked away and guarded. Tested on against her will.

However, a day comes when her cell door mysteriously unlocks. The lab is devoid of all life and its subjects have been left in solitude. The question is why? What lies in wait in these emptied halls?

name: Reforj
description: Reclaim the future. Rewrite the past. Reforj the world.

name: Quest Master's Realm: Land of the Phoenix
description:
Dungeon Expansion for Quest Master's Realm.

Strange phenomena have been reported in the Orcazelos Desert , unexplained disturbances originating from below the surface.

Your job is to investigate, discover what is going on there.

Combat a new range of foes beneath the desert in the exciting Dungeon, 'The Solace of Q'ro'.

Mythical treasures await those who dare to venture here, a new range of equipment unavailable elsewhere in the game!

name: Stars and Empires: Colony Defense
description: An RTS/Action 3rd person shooter that forces players to defend their base against waves of unknown threats of all kinds. Use strategy, unique abilities, tech research and combat skills to hold off any invaders.

name: Gridlink
description: Gridlink is a fun, minimalist puzzle game with a simple premise - connect the numbers on a square grid with a single, continuous line that traverses all squares and does not cross itself.

name: Space Adventure Cobra: The Awakening
description: Play as Cobra, the space pirate, in an action platformer adapted from the famous anime series. Along with Lady Armaroid, your loyal partner, and equipped with your iconic Psychogun, you must solve a mysterious threat hanging over the entire universe.

name: Mannequin Machine
description: "Mannequin machine" is a first-person psychological horror game with camera effects that tells the story of working in a mannequin factory. Beware of the evil at the heart of the plant, it drives its victims crazy

name: Sonic Z-Treme
description: Sin descripción

name: Never Stop Never Stopping
description: Never Stop Never Stopping is a Boom Compatible level where the idea is to keep moving at all time. It's a relatively short adrenaline rush designed to keep you on your feet. It also uses @Tango's excellent minicharge mod as a base.

name: Freedom Wars Remastered
description: Born into a one-million-year prison sentence, you must survive deadly missions to earn any hope of freedom. Die in prison or live on the battlefield. The choice is yours.

name: Meteor Arena
description:
The new genre of multi-action games, “Party × Shooter,” is here!
Enjoy intense team battles packed into 90 seconds with simple movement controls and the game-changing “Meteor” attack!

name: Green Biker Dude
description:
Now it's your chance to pop that wheelie for everlasting peace! Join the famous Green Biker Dude in his intense pre-X2 training efforts and hone your fighting and racing skills with a Ride Chaser in two different game modes. Challenge the main "story" mode, blasting enemies for score as you race hard to the finish of the four tracks, ending with a boss battle and the tragic story of Green Biker Dude.
Brush up on your racing skills in Time Attack mode, where you leave behind score and enemies and race hard for the best possible time. Submit your highest score and best times to the Global Records to compete with players around the world, or battle and chase with a friend locally in VS mode.

name: Christmas Escape Toy
description:
Christmas is coming soon, but somehow you are locked in a room like children's room.
Escape from here before Christmas.

name: Morning Room
description: This is a puzzle-solving game in which you click to examine the screen to find clues and messages, solve codes, and find hidden keys

name: Toshiue Kanojo
description: Sin descripción

name: Resurrection: Nuke island - Weapons Pack
description: This pack includes guns, grenades, scopes additionally to join mission with Roman

name: Neutral Mini Escape: Midsummer Night ver.
description: A banner-sized summer-themed escape game

name: Duty First
description: Sin descripción

name: Seed of Heroes
description: Seed of Heroes is a bullet heaven game where players take on the role of warriors seeking glorious battles and get into the halls of Valhalla. Journey through various realms, take on hordes of enemies, collect treasures, and defeat bosses that will try to stop you. Pass the trials and tribulations and prepare for the Ragnarok.

name: The Troll Sides
description:
Welcome to the Troll Sides!
This is a brand new campaign with remixed versions of the base game levels, with trolls!

- 7 chapters
- 2 intermission chapters
- Beginner accessible
- Playtested
- 220 hours of work

name: Las Aventuras de Frank el Enano
description: Sin descripción

name: Kyokkou no Marriage
description: Sin descripción

name: Kyokkou no Marriage: Episode Lia
description: An all-ages version of Kyokkou no Marriage that only contains Lia's route.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Ishin! Muryou App
description: An application for PlayStation Vita based on Yakuza: Ishin! released only in Japan. The game features some side contents from the main game such as farming, cooking, gambling, cards and fighting in dungeons.

name: Yuukoku no Femme Fatale
description: Sin descripción

name: Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered
description: Experience the critically acclaimed Horizon Zero Dawn with stunning new visuals and upgraded features. In a far future where colossal machines roam the Earth, pockets of humanity survive in unique tribes among the lush, overgrown ruins of our long-lost civilization.

name: Infinite Sudoku
description: Never run out of sudoku puzzles to play. Game contains a custom puzzle generator, so you will always get a new puzzle each time!

name: Senpai ga Watashi no Mousou ni Doujin Suru?!: Body Touch ni Goyoujin
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket Arcade: Sudoku for Kids
description: An LCD Sudoku game released in 2006.

name: Pocket Arcade: Sudoku Electronic
description: Pocket Arcade: Sudoku Electronic is an LCD Sudoku game released in 2006 by Westminster.

name: M&M's Sudoku Game
description: M&M's Sudoku Game is a promotional LCD sudoku game handheld based on the M&M's.

name: Everglyph Trials
description: Everglyph Trials is a combat roguelite deckbuilder in which you unleash devastating combos with unique dual cards. Battle deadly foes, adapt your deck, and uncover its secrets.

name: Sonic Alpha
description: Sonic Alpha is a 2D classic sonic fan game inspired off the time when older 2D Sonic fan games were made such as Sonic XG, Sonic Nexus, Sonic Classic, Sonic Axiom, etc; with a Mania inspired touch. It will feature returning stages as well as new ones.

name: Dragons Brew
description: Dragons Brew is a captivating boardgame cafe simulation game where you can create and manage your very own cozy cafe. Drawing inspiration from beloved games like Stardew Valley and Traveller’s Rest, Dragons Brew combines charming pixel art with engaging simulation mechanics.

name: Reader Rabbit Preschool
description: Reader Rabbit and Mat the Mouse take charge in this spunky preschool prep program in which the duo must scare up keys to unlock The Wonder Pony and ride the magic carousel. You'll earn keys by playing four different games that teach basic math, shapes, colors, and listening skills. Play hide and seek learn counting forward and backward, visit the diner to whip up some banana-fish-corn casserole and become acquainted with the alphabet, or join the Pattern Parade to learn logic. There are four different skill levels, so as you get smarter, the games get harder.

name: PSoul
description: Step into the thrilling world of PSoul, the ultimate Pokémon-themed MMORPG, where adventure awaits at every corner. Become a Pokémon trainer and explore a vast open world teeming with over 700 iconic and unique Pokémon. Embark on epic quests, discover hidden treasures, challenge powerful trainers, and compete in heart-pounding tournaments. Whether you're battling to be the best or forging friendships in a vibrant community, PSoul offers endless excitement and challenges for all Pokémon enthusiasts. Your legendary journey starts here!

name: Sonic Eternal
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Skies
description: Sin descripción

name: Doces Santos o Jogo
description:
Doces Santos: The Game is a delightful experience that captures the joy of preparing treat bags for the feast of Saint Cosmas and Saint Damian!

With an intuitive interface, players must check the candy demand for the bag and, with a simple tap on the screen, drag the candies into the bag. It’s a fun way to celebrate this tradition!

this game was made in the brazilian nacional museum

name: VGMQ: Video Game Music Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Runners Reloaded
description: Sin descripción

name: Fate Trigger: The Novita
description: Fate Trigger: The Novita is a 3D Anime-style, hero-based tactical shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5, available across multiple platforms. Dive into a dynamic world of floating islands, become a sharpshooter with extraordinary special skills, craft your own strategies, and engage in thrilling, spectacular life-or-death showdowns!

name: Sonic Metal Adventure
description: Welcome to Sonic Metal Adventure! A 2D platformer similar to Sonic Rush with Dreamcast era graphics and music.

name: Sonic Battle for Station Square
description: Sonic Battle For Station Square is a game that experiments by bringing the collectathon style of games to 2D. This game is heavily inspired by the game "Spongebob Battle For Bikini Bottom"

name: Sonic Adventure Blast
description:
Sonic Adventure Blast is a fan game that aims to capture the feeling of movement in Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2, while making various changes and additions to make it feel new and unique.

There are 22 different levels (plus a boss fight), with a total of 60 different missions to collect A ranks. There are also hidden NPC's hidden throughout the levels to collect. You can unlock different skins to play as by finding these hidden NPC's and getting A ranks.

A large amount of levels are from Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2, but there are also plenty of levels from other games as well. Delfino Plaza and Noki Bay have been made into treasure hunting levels, where Knuckles searches for randomized emerald pieces. In Kingdom Valley, you play as Tails, who can use his fly ability to reach the many cliff ledges and structures in the level.

There are four different types of missions - Normal Mode, Ring Attack, Lost Chao, and Hard Mode. Ring Attack has you collect a certain amount of rings, which vary per level. In Lost Chao, you have to search for a chao hidden somewhere in the level. Hard Mode is for treasure hunting levels, and the pieces are not randomized, but you don't have a radar, so look closely!

name: Sonic Stranded
description:
Sonic faced many dangers before, but now, he will have to face a new one... hunger. In this 3D, Adventure-like game, Sonic will be stranded on a deserted island and it's up to him to build a settlement and find other castaways, who were prisoners on Egg Carrier before it crashed. And most important, survive. However, the island has keys to many mysteries, including origins of the original Phantom Ruby...

This 3D Sonic fangame is style of Sonic Adventure is aiming to create engaging level design with dozens of alternate paths and zero boost pads. This game brings Classic-like physics which can be used to reach new paths, elemental shields, new Special Stages, multiple playable characters with unique abilities designed with S3&K/Mania/Advance philosophy and heavy focus on story.

name: Sonic & Knuckles: Key Hunters
description: Sin descripción

name: Kyle & Lucy: Wonderworld
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Mania: Colorful Encore
description: Colorful Encore is an enhancement project for Sonic Mania Plus focused on reimaginated or revamped palettes for Encore Mode. Some of them were reworked from scratch with original themes, others are enhanced versions of the originals. It also improves some sprites and other visual assets.

name: Sonic Limitless
description: Sonic Limitless is a 2D modern fangame that aims to recapture the gameplay found in Generations.

name: Standbox
description: STANDBOX is a single-player physics sandbox about bullying a ragdoll. Shoot him, push him, watch him get back up until he doesn't.

name: Sudden Attack 2
description: The game featured much of the same modes and play styles from the original game with added customization for characters and a newer game engine which allowed for more updated graphics. Launched in July 2016, Sudden Attack 2 was shut down 23 days later due to an end of contract with the game developer. Plans for a Japanese launch of the game were never realized due to the abrupt shutdown of its servers.

name: Sky Streaker
description: Dodge clothes, grab coins, and outrun Gumball and Darwin as you climb sky high!

name: Super Slime Blitz
description: How high will you go? Find out in Super Slime Blitz!

name: Wrecker's Revenge
description: Dr. Wrecker zapped all of Elmore into the Void! Only Gumball is crazy enough to try and save them.

name: Badge(r)s
description:
The game all about creating, sharing, collecting and moving virtual swag!

Badge(r)s! the casual location based (aka GPS) MMO.

name: Wasteland
description: Arcade style Top-Down 2D Zombie Shooter

name: Bit Esc
description: Break free from the system in Bit Esc, an action/adventure platformer where Bit sets out to escape from the tyrannic OS. Explore the digital world, overcome frantic challenges, meet new friends and make tough decisions that’ll determine the fate of Bit and the world around them.

name: Sweave
description: Sweave is a hyper-casual game that showcases African culture through unique patterns, weaves, and symbols.

name: Blood & Play
description: Hot single vampires in your area wanna give you the SUCC?! Blood & Play is a gay T4T visual novel about a guy who just lost his job in the tech industry and the centuries-old vampire who's willing to buy his blood. A deal this good can't actually be real, right...?

name: Cliff Hanger
description: In the game, different scenes from a Western movie are shot. Either you play the hero "Cliff Hanger" on your own, or twosome when his brother "Coat" joins in. The aim is, to release an action at the right point of time, to "kill" the bandit "El Bandito", who runs through the screen (e. g. roll a rock, throw a boomerang, fire a canon, etc.). The scenes are chosen randomly by the program and are repeated until the action was successful. The title of the scene gives a hint to what scene will come up. The game was obviously inspired by the old Looney Toons Roadrunner and Wile E. Coyote cartoons.

name: The Crystal Frog
description: Your object is to find and bring back the crystal frog.

name: Wicked Room
description: A Halloween-themed riddle solving game

name: Backwater Eulogy
description:
Backwater Eulogy is a stream of consciousness, autobiographical exploration of loss and the double-sided nature of grief. Told as a linear narrative, there are no choices, and there are no alternate endings. Sit and stay for a moment, before leaving.

Taking the form of a short visual novel, this is a short story of sorts about grief, moving on, and life in the rural Midwest. As a "kinetic novel" there are no alternative routes or choices- just one storyline to follow to its inevitable conclusion. Placing an emphasis on a small, curated experience, it is best experienced in one sitting.

name: Card of Legend: Awaken Angels
description:
Angels, Cards, Battle! Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces!
A fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.

Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces! A competitive Anime TCG game featuring fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.This game features PvP, PvE, Roguelike, Single Player Missions, and others. Play your cards right!

name: Mr. Goofer’s Mini Game Arcade Party!
description: A collection of over 30 arcade-inspired retro mini games, each with their own unique genre and style! It's a back-to-back marathon of playable, pixelated old-fashioned fun! What’s the highest score that YOU can reach?

name: Ourlands
description: Ourlands is a cozy island builder where you craft bespoke little lands for friendly little Islanders.

name: Ribbet
description: Join Ribbet, the young and mischievous frog, on an exciting adventure in this action-packed video game! Take on the role of Ribbet as you navigate through a myriad of challenging hazards and obstacles. With his small stature and incredible parkour skills, he can escape from any sticky situation.

name: Rome Goes Rogue
description: Rome Goes Rogue is a chaotic roguelite where anything can happen when you least expect it

name: PRIN-C1
description: An Endless runner with a twist! Play as a dog named PRIN-C1 who can walk, trot and run but cannot stop.

name: Kirin no Kuni
description: Sin descripción

name: The Tag-along Obsession
description: The Tag-along Obsession is adapted from the movie "The Tag-along", based on the Urban Legend. It is a first-person horror puzzle adventure game, Players will play Hui-Ting and go into the situation to understand a series of supernatural phenomenon, and immerse themselves in the story, looking for the answers to everything.

name: Cortizone
description:
At the start of the game you find
yourself hiding under a pile of
refuse in a dark alleyway outside
the Zone, a hospital which was
converted after the great war to
hold both human and robotic
criminals at little expense to the
weakened government.
Conditions are barbaric as the inner
building is mainly unguarded leaving
prisoners to fight over limited
resources that are periodically
dropped into the building by supply
chute. Your aim is to gain entry to
the Zone by any means possible and
find the mad doctor thought to be
responsible for the creation of the
Adrenal Bomb, obtaining relevant
information to find and defuse this
devastating new device.
This will not be easy.

name: Muhaboy
description: Step into the shoes of Muhaboy! Dash and smash muha-s in this wild tactical beat 'em up, saving humanity from the looming Second Muha War! Battle it out with limited resources and adapt to the ever-changing chaos. Buzzopolis is waiting for its hero—time to show those muha-s who’s boss!

name: Brewed Horizons
description: Design your boat, tailor a drink menu fit for royalty and serve drinks while navigating through the kingdom. Explore the high seas with your boat! The islanders need a ferry, and he kingdom needs you to uncover the mystery of the Coffee Queen's disappearance!

name: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
description: Gold makes god. Embrace city-building chaos. Pet giant monsters! Watch puny adventurers! Bend nature to your will with powerful spells and the greatest of all forces of nature - GOLD. Colony sim / reverse RPG

name: Operation: Polygon Storm - The Train
description: The Train DLC expands the base game, introducing a new map centered around the Train and its theme. Get ready for a challenging battle with multiple choke points, cover opportunities, new units, and updated models for existing soldiers.

name: Fated Land
description: This is a Pixel Tactical Self-Propelled RPG Games The battle system adopts a semi-turn-based design, Quick Battle or Enter the Battlefield? It's time to decide! In this journey full of magic, you will also meet a variety of characters, who may become your allies, or your partners...

name: Theta and Paralldoxs on Worldlines
description: In this puzzle game, you can use a fork that can split yourself to create a variety of unimaginable "Paralldox"s.

name: Gates of Migad
description: Gates of Migad is set in medieval Northern Europe. Through the protagonist's travel perspective, it presents a panoramic view of the Nordic culture and the times, explores the conflicts behind countless myths, and gives players a deep experience of "role-playing and immersion".

name: A.L.I.G.N.E.D
description: Line up matching pieces in rows or columns to delete to delete them and clear the board.

name: No Caddie Included
description:
Crank-swing your way thru some fantastic golf-courses.
The perfect on-the-go golf "simulator".

name: First in... Line?
description: "It's opening night, and our lead star dropped out! Can you memorize these lines REALLY quickly?"

name: Dance Break Dance
description: In Dance Break Dance, it's all about quick reflexes and perfect timing. Spin the crank to make your adorable dancer bust out wild moves, but be sure to stop in time! The faster you crank, the crazier the dance, and the more points you score. Can you keep up with the rhythm and become the cutest dance master?

name: The Game of the Goose
description: The Game of the Goose is a historical racing game for two to eight players. It is a chaotic game of luck in which players take turns rolling dice in an attempt to reach the center of the board by exact count. Winning and losing are never certain. Unlucky players will lose turns or be pushed back, but players who land on the spaces bearing geese can cross the board quickly.

name: MegaMan Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Brazilian Drug Dealer 3: I Opened a Portal to Hell in the Favela Trying To Revive Mit Aia I Need to Close It
description: Brazilian Drug Dealer 3 is a fast-paced ultraviolent Brazilian old-school FPS heavily inspired by the first Quake, using the same engine as the game (ID TECH2). made as a tribute to the Brazilian mods of the 2000s, the Brazilian bootleg games of the 2000s, Brazilian music, and the King of Brazilian music, Mit Aia!

name: Animals & Coins
description: Join players around the globe in this animal adventure game. Build treasure islands and bridges, raid your friends’ bases, collect coins, unlock new pet characters, and go on a journey to explore the legendary animal kingdom!

name: My Special Summer Vacation 2
description: Boku has been sent to live with his aunt over the course of his summer vacation. The small town where she lives may be out in the sticks, but it still has a number of interesting characters to meet and play with, and plenty of activities for a young man to enjoy!

name: Use Your Words 2
description:
“The party game for funny people and their unfunny friends” is back!

The cult hit Use Your Words has all-new prompts and twice as many mini-games where you compete to write the funniest punchline – we set ‘em up, and you knock ‘em down! Players can use their phones or tablets as controllers, so it’s easy to jump in and seamless to play. And if you can’t think of a punchline, you can use one of our sneaky "Decoy” answers to lay a trap for your opponents… all with beautiful new visuals by artist Andrew Kolb!

name: Saudade
description: Cross through the barren landscape looking for a big enough rock to throw yourself of off. Point and click in post-apocalyptic Galiza through a cooking game with only one recipe.

name: EZ2AC: Endless Circulation
description: EZ2AC : Endless Circulation is the 11th installment of EZ2DJ/EZ2AC series. It is the first game to adopt the new EZ2AC name, retiring its old EZ2DJ name and the first game to be officially released by SQUARE PIXELS as a whole company.

name: Stair Tower
description: This is a vertical platform game: climb the terrible tower and reach the top to make your wish come true. More than 16 horizontal levels medium-high difficulty Variety of settings

name: Omut
description: A punishing fever dream combining abject terror, dark comedy, and many, many deaths.

name: Stinkytown
description: You are the Mayor of Stinkytown. Your town stinks after a bit of a downward spiral you've experienced lately. Solve puzzles, manage energy and clean your surroundings in Stinkytown, a small puzzle game. Coming soon!

name: Lucha Libre: Legend of the Mask
description: Join the action in our 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up game for up to four players! Immerse yourself in the colorful world of Mexican Lucha Libre, where unique mechanics combine the elegant yet brutal art of lucha libre with classic combat. Team up and unleash spectacular moves to defeat your foes!

name: Pirofauna

When a player makes too many mistakes, they are at risk of elimination and can choose another player to challenge. The winner takes the prize fund of the other player, who is eliminated. The last remaining player must answer seven questions. If they fail to answer enough correctly, the losing finalist can steal the champion's title by answering an eighth question.
The game features both single-player and multiplayer modes for up to seven players. Each player can customize their name and appearance. The PlayStation 2 version supports the EyeToy camera. The game is fully voiced by the original host, Amadeus.

name: Sonic Mania & Sonic Plus

Sonic Mania and Sonic PLUS is a complete overhaul of Sonic Mania and its DLC:

- Every badnik and Object been turned into Sonic.
- Every stage's color palette has been edited to Sonic's colors. Sonic might even appear in the background occasionally, so keep your eyes peeled!
- Some music tracks have been remixed to include various vocal themes from the Sonic franchise (Usually Sonic's theme).
- Special Encore palettes for the levels that still relate to the Sonic theme while being different to the original in some fashion. (For example, Chemical Plant in Mania mode uses Sonic's Mania palette, while in Encore Mode it uses his Sonic 2 Palette.)
- Special Stages are not way past cooler with the addition of 5 million Sonic models on the screen!
- A very special ending for those who manage to make it all the way to the end of Encore Mode!

description:
Closed Faith is a freeware Strategy RPG made by Segawa. It was released the 28th of May 2023.

After being sealed away for 200 years, the God of Wisdom, Abyssliese, wakes up. They meet their loyal and only remaining priest, Theseus.

The reason why Abyssliese and many other gods were sealed away was because of a recent god named Tinirese. With his powers, he made himself the only god to be believed in.

Wanting to stop him, Abyssliese will try to get out of their temple with Theseus, but it will be a long and difficult task, even with the help of the many characters the duo will come across.

It seamlessly combines the crowd control & throw heavy melee combat of Beat 'Em Ups with the intense dodge & shoot gameplay of Shmups. It's fast paced, it's difficult, it's chaotic, it's a pure unbound arcade action game! A quick burst of adrenaline to start the day!

name: Calculate It

name: Secret Agent Clank
description:
A port of Secret Agent Clank, a platform video game developed by High Impact Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment, released for the PlayStation Portable (PSP) in 2008.

In the game, Clank dons his "Secret Agent Clank" persona, which was previously seen in brief TV show segments within the main series. The story revolves around Clank working to clear Ratchet's name after Ratchet is framed for a crime he did not commit. The gameplay diverges from the traditional Ratchet & Clank format, focusing more on stealth and gadget-based play, though it retains the series' trademark humour and style.

The port is enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Colossatron: Cosmic Crisis
description: The mega monster returns in a hectic shoot-em-up showdown against some mighty angry aliens! Swipe to dodge incoming attacks as you power up your weaponry by choosing upgrades.

name: Gibberish
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic Brick Wars
description: Fight wars with powerful bricks using characters from Halfbrick's games like Fruit Ninja & Jetpack Joyride.

name: Timore Narhelma
description: Timore Narhelma is a surreal experience about human mind and horrors within.

name: Ominous Recall
description: Ominous Recall is a first person survival horror game based on the middle eastern horror folktales.

name: Aldian of Ancients
description: Aldian of Ancients is a dinosaur multiplayer simulation/survival game aims to recreate the world of yore filled with creatures that defy comprehension.

name: Dashy Crashy 100
description: Start your engines and outrun 99 racers in a thrilling knockout race. 100 start. Only 1 survives. Lightning-fast reaction-racing with a 100-racer twist. Party up with friends, master simple tap controls and test your reflexes on choas-filled highways as you try to boost and bash your way to 1st place. Let's DASHY CRASHY!

name: Boonka
description: Once upon a time, flora and trees covered the peaceful countryside of a distant and beautiful world. To restore this once idyllic land to its former glory, you'll need to subdivide into various little nature spirits called Boonkas and work to heal the land. Boonka includes 3 different game modes designed for every kind of player. Restore the land to its once tranquil way of life in Adventure Mode, put your reflexes to the test in Blitz Mode, or take your time playing Beanstalk Mode. With over 60 fast-paced levels, 15 powerful, level-changing power-ups and bonuses, and truly addictive gameplay, Boonka has something for everyone!

name: Cyber Parkour
description: Cyber Parkour is a PVP mobile racing game with fast-paced gameplay. Race as a Cyber Runner on side-scrolling tracks, dodge obstacles, and use cyber abilities to win! Collect various runner skins and accessories along the way. Break free from the System and race through neon buildings to become the champion in Cyber Parkour.

name: Dream in the Shell
description:
When a black sphere appears on Earth, countless people become trapped in endless dreams. The protagonist's wife is among them, compelling him to venture into the dangerous sphere to save her.

'Dream in the Shell' is a story adventure game that explores surreal worlds where dreams, memories, and the subconscious blend. Explore mysterious spaces through unique interactions and uncover the truth.

name: Pia
description: "You have stepped on a landmine. How will you handle it?" This game challenges you to disarm a landmine using a multi-key input system, simulating the tough situation. By aligning the character's situation with the player's actions, it offers a unique experience. Using a pedal controller enhances the realism. Can you successfully disarm the landmine and survive?

name: Mecha Macho
description: Mecha Macho is an action/platform video game, in which you play as Luchin, a 3-year-old baby that is the reincarnation of the legendary wrestling champion "El Super Macho". You will travel through the universe in your robot suit to avenge his death, and recover his champion belt using wrestling techniques and powers, that you start to remember as you make your way through the game

name: Honey Pot
description: Dive into the immersive world of 'Honey Pot,' a cooperative action-strategy VR game where you and your friends become bees defending the hive from bears on the hunt. Fly, gather honey, construct turrets, deploy stingers, and use bow and arrow attacks in a frantic battle to protect Queen Bee Melli's domain. Team up, strategize, and save the hive in this thrilling VR experience!

name: Fall
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Look Back!
description:
You've taken what seems like an easy task: find missing keys to unlock doors that will lead you to secrets of the abandoned house. What you don't know is the danger that lurks in the house.

Find all 6 keys and reveal all the secrets that the house holds! Listen to Crooked Man sounds, be aware of your surroundings, but DO NOT LOOK AT HIM!

name: Seeking Cat
description: In "Seeking Cat," explore a cozy, cluttered room filled with cleverly hidden cats. Can you uncover all the hidden cats and become the ultimate cat finder?

name: Eijukugo Target 1000 DS
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape 2: The Closet
description: In this point and click adventure game, explore every inch of the closet in an attempt to find anything that might help you escape. Every item and every clue will have some kind of use, and it’s up to you to discover just what this use is, and how exactly to go about solving the game’s puzzles in your attempt to escape the closet.

name: Escape 4: The Bathroom
description: In order to escape the bathroom, you’ll need to figure out a series of point and click puzzles. Then, and only then, will you be able to find you way out of this room. Don’t try to simply leave through the door, either. Those lasers probably hurt.

name: The Hellblade Bundle
description:
Embark on a journey of cinematic immersion in the Hellblade games bundle.
This collection brings together two critically acclaimed titles in Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice and its sequel, Senua’s Saga: Hellblade II for an unforgettable experience.

name: Bally Fears: The Introduction Game
description: You are a child named Reyes Spherikaw. Your mother passed away a few days ago, but Reyes doesn't know this yet. Your father has brought you to his workplace because there was no one to look after you. The game begins when your father calls you to warn you about something...

name: Billy Boy's Important Wine Lottery
description: Sin descripción

name: Devious Path
description: You are trapped in an endless astral world. Keep a close eye on your surroundings to get out of the astral world.

name: Battlefield
description:
A new Battlefield is set to return to the "Modern Setting" in 2025:
• "Back to basics approach"
• 64 player maps
• No specialists, traditional classes are back
• Head of Respawn & Group GM for EA Studios Organization Vince Zampella: "We have to get back to the core of what Battlefield is and do that amazingly well [referencing BF3-BF4]"

name: Recesses
description: Unravel the mystery of your missing 5th grade friend in Recesses, a schoolyard roguelite card battler. Collect rare cards and construct a spaceship that outplays even the most powerful Battaliens cards printed.

name: Reflector Satellites
description: In Reflector Satellites, you play as a space defender fighting off an endless number of enemy ships. Your opponents are ships of three colors: red, blue and yellow. Use mirrors to redirect your shots and destroy enemies more effectively.

name: Typingcommand
description: In Typingcommand, you have to defend the Earth from a continuous stream of asteroids. Asteroids fall from the sky, threatening to destroy everything in their path. Your task is to destroy asteroids before they reach the surface of the planet.

name: Tiny Starfighters
description: Embark on an exciting space adventure where you take control of a spaceship and battle endless waves of enemies across the galaxy. Collect coins as you blast through your foes and unlock new, powerful ships to enhance your journey. With every wave, the challenge intensifies—how long can you survive the cosmic chaos? Prepare to gear up and zap your way to victory!

name: TimeSplitters 2
description: The PS2 version of "TimeSplitters 2" was added to the PlayStation Plus game catalog for PS4 & PS5 on August 20th, 2024 for PS Plus Premium members.

name: TimeSplitters
description: Sin descripción

name: TimeSplitters: Future Perfect
description: The PS2 version of the "TimeSplitters: Future Perfect" was added to the PlayStation Plus game catalog on August 20th, 2024 for PS Plus Premium members on PS4 & PS5.

name: Beyond Border
description: Help Aki the alligator find his way home in Beyond Border! Navigate through four challenging stages – from the mysterious Forest to the spooky Cemetery. Each stage brings new enemies and obstacles, such as sticky slimes and giant spiders, that will test your survival skills.

name: The Jumping Burger Rush
description:
From the creative minds at The Jumping Food Games comes a fast-paced endless game that will put your reflexes to the test: "The Jumping Burger Rush". In this neon-colored adventure, you control a jumping burger through the vastness of the galaxy and try to push your high score higher and higher. The adrenaline-pumping gameplay will test your reflexes in a fast and challenging endless game where you have to maneuver your burger through a dangerous, neon-lit galaxy.

Endless challenges await as you dodge obstacles, overcome tricky passages, and collect points to beat your own high score over and over again. Can you manage to break your personal record time and time again, dominating the leaderboard and proving your skill by outding yourself? Jump, dodge, and maneuver your burger through the infinite galaxy, mastering the unstoppable pace to beat your high score.

name: Super Mario Kart in Sonic Mania+
description: Sin descripción

name: Planet Oio
description: Planet Oio is a game where you play as the Enerbeing, Oio. You must save the planet from evil bucket-like robots!

name: LampMan
description: Sin descripción

name: Project MA
description: Sin descripción

name: Areena 4
description: Gladiator manager game, with goal to win the Riimukallio championship. Matches are turn-based. Gladiators can be equipped with weapons and spells, and their skills improve over time.

name: Vine Time
description: Collect 10 pieces of fruit in the monkey's basket to win the game.

name: Desert Dive
description: Lift and drop Big Blue to launch his friend into the pool. Make five dives to win.

name: Painkiller: Special Edition
description:
A very specific release of Painkiller that only contains 12 levels.
Crank up the intesity as you blast your way through 12 levels of mayhem and more than 75 species of Hell's wildest incarnations. Experience frantic action and wicked weapons: fire your stakegun and pin you enemies to the walls, or lob a grenade to send them flying!

name: Swing Fling
description: Swing high enough to fling the bird past the the start line three times to win the game.

name: Kreton La Resistance
description: Save the Moles from prison and escape from the 19th century!

name: Log Run
description: Avoid five obstacles (rocks or bees) to win.

name: Turtle Wax
description: Adjust the height of the ladder to try to land on the target. Land on the target three times to win!

name: Double Hooked
description: Drag the hooks to catch the fish while watching for sharks. Catch five fish to win!

name: When Pigs Fly
description: Bounce from cloud to cloud and catch food along the way. Catch five apples to win!

name: Helipopper
description: Pop the balloons that match the color of your hat. Pop five to win!

name: Gnomes and Knights
description: Gnome hunting reaches a new level! Become a mighty knight and plunge into the world of dark fantasy without leaving your home.

name: Croc Cannon
description: Feed three crocs using your cannon to win the game.

name: Bodycam Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Prison Survival: Inmate Life Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Simon Sees
description: Match the monster's eyes to his reflection in the mirror. Make five matches to win!

name: Wild Hunter: Sniper Rifle Adventures Simulator
description: Track your prey. Feel the suspense. Become a legendary hunter!

name: Viking City Tycoon
description: Build, raid, conquer – lead your Viking empire to glory!

name: MX Dirt Bike: Unlimited Bike Experience
description: Sin descripción

name: Digging for Worms
description: Dig up worms while looking for money. Find five coin caches to win.

name: Rockin' Rabbit
description: Drag each puzzle piece to its correct place to reveal the Rockin' Rabbit.

name: Shape Invasion
description: Line up the shape characters with the shapes falling from the sky. Make five matches to win!

name: Pickle Pop
description: Pop the bubbles before they hit the ground. Complete five rounds to win!

name: Halloween Pumpkin Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Buried Memories
description: Memorize the locations of the three items the dog buried, and then dig up the one shown.

name: Learn to Play Vol. 6: Labyrinth
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn to Play Vol. 7: Safe Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Dinosaur RPG: Dino Survival Simulator Survivor
description: Survive the Past! Unleash prehistoric power evolve, explore, conquer!

name: Creepy Crawlers
description: Steer through the maze and eat opponents smaller than you. Grow in size by eating an enemy or a bus. To make your opponents shorter, you can nibble away at their tail. If your opponent is the same size as you or longer, you'll be eaten!

name: Survival Float Simulator: Crocodile Waters Craft, Raft, Build
description: Survive on the Raft Conquer the Swamp, Beware the Crocodile

name: Frost Bite
description: Catch and eat five snowflakes to win.

name: Star Climber
description: Build your ladder into the sky to collect stars, but watch out for stray satellites! Collect three stars to win.

name: Burned Out
description: Pinch out the fuses before they reach the top.

name: Apple Catch
description: Collect ten apples in your basket to win.

name: SkyGunner
description: Sin descripción

name: Treasure Dive
description: Travel to the ocean floor to collect your treasure while navigating around the other sea creatures in your path. Complete three trips to win!

name: Pig Pile
description: Eliminate the objects in the pile to safely land the pig on the platform.

name: Mister Mosquito
description: Sin descripción

name: Fly Trap
description: Catch all the flies to win the game.

name: Color Creature
description: Use the brush to paint the creature. When you're done, make him move!

name: Daisuki: The Her Adonis
description:
You are the class president.
You are a human being with a strong sense of justice.
While investigating the case of a missing classmate, you came across a girl.
You are going to visit her house to talk to the girl.

name: Exista!
description: EXISTA! offers a journey of a child through intriguing challenges and obstacles. In the role of the child, you must overcome obstacles using your natural abilities. As you progress, new skills are acquired, enabling you to face increasingly complex challenges.

name: Change and Drop
description: simple and casual ball drop game .

name: Sinesperia
description: A story about a girl that needs to make her way through a hindered journey by revisiting glimpses of her former self to uncover the secrets behind her existence and purpose.

name: MegaDestroyer Frantis
description: Alien shooting game with a top-down perspective

name: Frantis: Mission II
description: Frantis Mission II is unlike its predecessor an action platformer.

name: Pokémon Scorched Silver
description: Sin descripción

name: The Funbrain Arcade!
description: This arcade contained 25 mini-games in which the player would move a game piece along a board game as you played mini-games to progress. Upon landing on a space, the player was required to beat the mini-game to progress down the board.

name: Pokemon Charged Red
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Exceeded
description: Sin descripción

name: Funbrain Math Arcade
description: A collection of 25 math related games, with difficulty varying depending on the age of the player.

name: Body Quest
description:
A Russian educational platform game about human anatomy where you learn the structure of the human body through mini-game segments.
The game consists of the platforming segment where you need to traverse different floors of the hospital to reach the computer and configure how to setup the different body parts. These computers acts as the mini-games for the player to learn about the body structure.
You win the game once you have done all the floors and completed all the computer setups.

name: Baldur's Gate Java Game
description: The award-winning RPG series comes to your mobile phone! One of the most beloved Dungeons & Dragons interactive adventures ever, Baldurs Gate set the standard for character development and storyline. Explore the treacherous dungeons of the Forgotten Realms where treasures are plenty, magic & monsters abound and fantastic adventure awaits.

name: Accel World: Kasoku no Chouten - Limited Edition
description: Accel World: Kasoku no Chouten is an Adventure game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2013.

name: Aooni.io
description: An online battle royale spin off of the "Ao Oni" series. Released in Japan as "Ao Oni Online"

name: Sonic Knight In Training
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Dash Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for mobile as part of the Sonic Cafe service.

name: 60 Seconds to Escape
description: You are trapped in an escape room, the timer is counting down, you only have one minute to escape the room ! Find clues and note them down, the room resets but not the note pad ! Keep it up, I have faith in you !

name: Sonic Golf C-Mode Cup
description: Sin descripción

name: Pyrates
description: Play any of the included five Mega Bloks Pyrates minigames to earn Pyrate merits.

name: Starveil Protocol A.A.A.
description: STARVEIL PROTOCOL A.A.A. is a text-based role-playing game inspired by PC-98 era Japanese text adventures. In this chaotic and dangerous dystopian cyberpunk world, players must overcome challenges through dice rolls and their character's skills, like in tabletop role-playing games.

name: The Dark Phantom: Dawn of Darkness
description:
The Dark Phantom is a 3D third person shooter powered by UDK technology with emphasis on covering and dynamic gun fights. The player will play in the role of Shabgard, a man robbed of his past, seeking light in the darkness.

The game features advanced A.I. that not only take advantage of covers but also work cooperatively to force player out of cover to make the gameplay dynamic and keep player on his toes.

name: Spirit of the Stones
description: You are a treasure hunter and arrive on the Isle of Wight to find valuable diamonds which were hidden there centuries ago.

name: World of Squares
description: A feel-good MMO with rich mechanics. Paint with your friends, play a cube violin in the woods, discover an ancient ruins, fight valiant knights and dangerous mobs, become a fox sacrificing yourself to a dangerous altar at midnight, chill with a fishing rhythm game, upgrade your gear and character.

name: Funeralopolis: Last Days
description:
The city of Huta-Grobno hasn't seen sunlight in months after strange clouds enveloped the skies above it. Something’s brewing in the air… and underneath the surface.

This is a story oriented and text heavy game with a linear structure, featuring light horror elements.

name: Sonic The Hedgehog Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Universe Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Nostalgia Zero
description: Nostalgia Zero is a set of 36 maps in CL3 for The Ultimate Doom. This WAD uses exclusively vanilla textures and vanilla limits, with the target source port being Chocolate Doom. In terms of gameplay and level design it’s much closer to the IWAD than either of the Nostalgia WADs, though it does sometimes dip it’s toes into more modern tropes.

name: Astral Globetrot
description: A vanilla-compatible 32-map MegaWAD themed around space travel. After MAP11, there are four more episodes with radically different visual iden﻿tities that add new textures, and each map at least indirectly leads into the next one.

name: Heaven's Cybernetic (De)Athlete: Zeug
description:
"RUN LEAP GRIND AND MOST IMPORTANTLY ]]KILL

*A DEVASTATING MINDHACK. A BROKEN SIMULATION. REALITY SEEPING WITH BUGS AND GLITCHES. POWER THROUGH.*"

A browser-based death tournament DOOMlike made for DOMINO CLUB's Bodies in Motion Jam.

name: Children of Hell
description: You've been called in for a mandatory general examination. You don't know what to expect. A visual novel about immortal monster hunters used by the government.

name: The Jimi Hendrix Case
description: Enter the world of Jimi Hendrix, police detective. In a world where everyone is Jimi Hendrix, only Jimi Hendrix can piece together clues and find out who killed Jimi Hendrix. Created for MAGS July, 2015.

name: FIFA World Cup 2022
description: Compete as one of the 32 qualified teams in a complete solo recreation of the FIFA World Cup 2022, either playing from the opening match or customizing your tournament experience by changing groups and including teams that didn’t qualify for the FIFA World Cup finals in a Custom Tournament. In Online Tournament Mode, progress through the knockout stages with any of the 32 qualified countries, and go for FIFA World Cup glory against others from around the world.

name: Dream Crafter
description: Sin descripción

name: FIFA Women’s World Cup 2023
description: Experience the FIFA Women’s World Cup in a variety of ways in FIFA 23. Step onto the pitch and lead your country as a soccer star with your own custom player. You can also compete in the tournament in Solo Tournament Mode or Kick-Off Mode.

name: Sonic Island: Lost Paradise
description: A fangame about another Sonic's adventure. Being a "Sonic Island" duology reimagining.

name: Sonic Legacy
description: Sin descripción

name: 2018 FIFA World Cup Russia
description: Immerse yourself in the excitement and drama of football’s greatest event with an authentic tournament experience, featuring official FIFA World Cup elements. Play with all 32 qualified national teams, using the official match balls, in real-world stadiums, and compete for the iconic trophy – all rendered in stunning detail for the first time with the Frostbite game engine.

name: Sick Samurai
description: Sick Samurai is a blindingly fast and bloody action game based on instant-death combat. Immerse yourself in lofi hip hop and retro anime aesthetics as you slash and dash your way to becoming the greatest fighter on the island.

name: The Blades of Ashina
description: A collection of new weapons with unique movesets from and inspired by Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice.

name: Dark Souls III: Born From the Ashes
description: Mod aims is to make game significantly harder by adding a lot of enemies around the dark souls world, providing more build possibilities and balancing NG+7, new weapons and armors with brand new powerful skills and passives, better HUD and many more.

name: Hollow Overhaul
description: Overhaul mod for veterans, with new balance, less bonfires, atmosphere lighting, new enemy placements, bosses, items, spells, shiny red blood, new status effects and many others core changes in gameplay.

name: Dark Dynasty: The Siege of Londor
description:
Take control of an ancient warrior from the era of the Three Kingdoms and lead your armies, the dragons, the Abyss Watchers, and the Outrider Knights against the forces of Londor. Join the Shu or Wei dynasty in a conquest for land. Or, take Londor for yourself by joining swords with the Mercenaries. Lore and story is a new twisted end to the Souls series.

This mod is an overhaul of most things in the game. Completely changes the way you play the game with super poise and sweeping attacks. Game progresses in a completely new storyline and map layout. You are an ancient hero, and it's about time you acted the part. You will face a new kind of challenge, unlike any seen in the Souls series. Strategize, and use the new spells and abilities to unleash chaos unto your enemies.

Quick romp through the world of DS3. Utilizing underused areas of the game. Play with your current character if you like, you will only miss the firelink shrine lead up. Armour resistances are much more important in this game. Upgrading the new weapons is integral. Leveling helps a lot more due to weapon scaling. Don't forget: you can retreat from a battle to upgrade.

name: Pocket Souls
description: New weapons, armour, items, boss battles, trainer battles and mechanics. Capture creatures from the world of DS3 and use them to vanquish your foes.

name: Graceborne
description: ﻿Graceborne is a mod overhaul heavily inspired by Bloodborne, its main goal is to turn Elden Ring's base game into a more grim and sinister experience through multiple means.

name: Championship Bowling
description:
A bowling game from Romstar.

Championship Bowling was produced by Romstar in 1989.

Romstar released 9 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1987. Romstar was based in United States.

Other machines made by Romstar during the time period Championship Bowling was produced include: Sky Shark, Time Soldiers, Cal .50 - Caliber Fifty, Down Town, Fire Shark, Skeet Shot, and Popshot!

name: Bundle of Joy
description: Bundle of Joy is a lighthearted, story-rich, minigame romp about becoming a parent during the pandemic. Complete all your child-rearing tasks, manage your stress, find time to rest, survive the day, wake up, and do it all over again. It won't be perfect, but that's ok. You're doing your best.

name: Shootout Pool
description:
A 3-D pool game where players use a real cue stick to hit on-screen cueball to effect the on-screen billiard balls.

Shootout Pool was produced by Sega in 2002.

Sega released 593 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1960. Sega was based in United States.

Other machines made by Sega during the time period Shootout Pool was produced include: Super Major League 2001, Power Smash 2, InuNoOsanpo, Crackin' DJ Part 2, Cyber Troopers Virtual On Force, House of The Dead 3, Virtua Striker 3, Beach Spikers, Virtua Striker 2002, and Maze Of The Kings, The

name: Pandemonia
description: Pandemonia is an arcade platform game developed by CRL Group PLC in 1983. The game is set in the year 2000, where planet Earth has been invaded by alien beings who control their domain from the top of the world's largest skyscraper. The player's task is to destroy the alien headquarters located in the skyscraper. The game features several challenging levels and gameplay mechanics.

name: Skyx
description: Skyx takes over the same operation while bringing it a new dimension. First, you no longer move a cursor, but a warrior, a mage, an elf or a acrobat. The character is chosen at the start of the game and has its own characteristics. For example, the elf is very fast and the mage has a protective shield. Your task of conquering the screen is complicated by the presence of numerous enemies who are reluctant to be uprooted! The spark is formidable: it pursues you as soon as you draw a territory, and catches up with you if you draw it too vast ... An all green alien also wanders to the right and to the left; if it touches the line of the territory you are delimiting, instant death! The witch is hardly friendly either, and is bent on restricting your conquests. Fortunately, there are also bonuses: regenerative apples, “flums” too, which bring extra life. However, this is not a reason to jump on any object lying around: the bottles of Gnaps are very, very harmful ...

name: Beyond Castle Wolfenstein
description: The Atari 8-bit version of the game has different graphics on the soldiers and character and sounds. The castle layout stays roughly the same.

name: Snø: Ultimate Freeriding
description: Snø is a raw, fast paced and challenging, yet minimalistic game about freeriding. Experience beautiful mountains inspired by Scandinavian nature and score points by doing risky moves like grinding on rocks, jumping off tree trunks and fly close to the treetops using your speedglider.

name: UEFA Euro 2024
description: The squads are set, and the competition is ready — including you. Lead your team against the best and chase international glory as Europe’s greatest teams compete for the UEFA EURO 2024 title. Feel the excitement and unpredictability of this iconic tournament, and make your mark on football history. The full UEFA EURO 2024 experience arrives in EA SPORTS FC 24 as a post-launch update, at no extra cost.

name: Beyond Castle Wolfenstein
description: The DOS version has different graphics but similar sound to Apple II version. Notably this is a bootable game.

name: Bullet Noir
description: In the vengeance business, you leave no loose ends. Four characters scour the city, searching for their mentor's murderer in a brutal ballet of bullets. Stylish neo-noir top-down shooter with one-hit-one-kill mechanics.

name: Need 4 Meat
description:
10,000 B.C. Primitive man walks the earth, proud but vulnerable. His only desire is that most scarce and precious resource: MEAT.

Take up your spears and establish yourself as the true apex predator. Pick off skittish rabbits if you can. But beware the crafty wolves, who pursue rabbits and humans both. For all are made of meat, and must return to meat in the bitter end.

Will the hunter become the hunted? Will you finally succumb to the relentless logic of natural selection? Or will you finally fulfill your….NEED 4 MEAT?

name: Microsoft Jewel 2
description:
READY FOR NEW MATCH 3 BLING!?
Microsoft Jewel 2 brings MORE sparkle to the classic Match 3 game with a collection of jewels that help you rack up MASSIVE points.

Build longer match combinations, play NEW bonus modes, and complete more challenges to reach a HIGHER score. This NEW version of Microsoft Jewel really knows how to shine!

Match 3 of the same jewel to build a collection of BONUS JEWELS. Use Bonus Jewels anywhere on the board to create larger matches, clear the board faster, and earn MORE points.

Complete matches to achieve challenge goals but BE CAREFUL, Jewels will not fall to fill the board so make every move count.

Reach new bonus levels and discover special gems you’ve never seen before. Combine classic Match 3 skills with sparkling surprises in this ALL-NEW version. Microsoft Jewel has never shined so bright!

Combine these new skills and see how far you can get in Microsoft Jewel 2!

name: Primordialis
description: Primordialis is a physics-based roguelike fish builder. Unleash your creativity to defeat creatures using venomous tentacles, electrical shocks, or exploding children. The possibilities are endless. Explore the primordial depths to reveal its secrets and discover what lies beyond.

name: Periculum
description: Periculum is a casual strategy game about conquering hexagonal tiles. Engage in battles against up to 7 bots or challenge your friends to see who comes out on top. With plenty of different game modes and options.

name: Noiramore Academy
description:
On the cold planet of Noivesse lies a school with a dark and storied history called Noiramore Academy. Judith Hovern, one of the talented students attending this institution, is a troubled but wickedly smart student who has an interest in discovering the forbidden secrets of the school. When one of the new teachers is violently kidnapped during the night, and Judith is the only witness, she must use her wit, powers, and puzzle-solving skills to illuminate the identity of the culprit and save the school.

Noiramore Academy is a 3D puzzle adventure game. Solve brain-teasing puzzles, explore the storied halls of the school, talk with interesting characters, and unlock the secret of the mystery plaguing the school.

name: Lunar Outpost
description: You have to defend the lunar outpost against attacks from outer space.

name: Toon Cup 2016
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot & Hentai
description: Step into the brand new version of the enchanting world of Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Funbox Ultimate Slots Bundle
description: Get ready to spin and win with the Ultimate Slots Bundle! Includes Celebrity Slot Machine, Tasty Slot Machine and Lucky Slots.

name: Firebat: Revolution
description: Break every brick in this retro pixel art adventure!

name: Doll Dress Up
description: Become the best doll stylist and make a fabulous princess!

name: Between Horizons + Lacuna Bundle
description: The bundle contains the full narrative detective adventure package for all you good noses out there!

name: Turbo Boost Racing

description: JALECOlle Famicom Ver. continues with back-to-back releases of Jaleco's Famicom titles! The third installment is Bio Warrior DAN The Increaser War!

name: The Lady, The Mage, & The Knight
description: Developed by Larian Studios, a tech demo was released at E3 2000 of the cancelled isometric RPG and later released as part of GOG's Divinity campaign. Gameplay focused heavily on the individual talents of these three protagonists, and puzzles, pitfalls and all kinds of tricky situations were solved by cleverly using their unique abilities.

Cursed Ones is a 1-2 player co-op horror survival game.
Play as the Crane siblings as you continue your late parents' legacy to purge the world of sinister spirits.
Track down the items used to summon the spirit by any means necessary.

Make sure you both don't die in the process.

name: Cidadão de SP Simulator
description: Adapted from Molleindustria's The New York Times Simulator, Cidadão de SP Simulator is a newspaper simulator where you assume the role of a newly hired editor. To keep your job, you have to make three layers of society happy: The rich, Israel and the police.

name: Ninpek

It's Ninja time! Run and jump to reach the end of the world.

Game available on UFO 50.

Game available on UFO 50.

Stop the jealous witch Cloverana from Sabotaging your garden!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Office Overloaded
description: Type quickly to process incoming documents without burning out. Sharpen your skills, climb up the ranks and challenge your coworkers around the globe. Can you stay cool under pressure and become the next CEO?

name: Dreams of Joy Departed
description: A surreal RPG. A tragedy with turn based combat and a hidden morality system.

name: Pixadom
description: Pixadom is a cozy 2D top-down social MMORPG with a charming pixel art style, playable directly in your browser on any modern device. Set in a vibrant world designed for social interaction, Pixadom blends the nostalgia of classic games with a fresh, community-driven experience. Players can enjoy a variety of activities, explore a richly detailed world, and participate in regular events. With a focus on community and creativity, Pixadom offers a unique, engaging multiplayer adventure that evolves through weekly updates and player-driven content.

name: Mysteries of Perception
description:
Mysteries of Perception is a detective game where you will see the same scene through the eyes of different characters. Uncover their secrets by analyzing all the clues. Switch perspectives and learn everything about the artifacts of the Distant and the deaths in their wake. Glory to the Stars!

Mysteries of Perception is a 2D investigative game structured like a choral narrative where you can jump from one character's perspective to another during the investigation. To gather more clues and progress in your investigation, it will be necessary to collect information from all viewpoints and confront them to reach plausible conclusions. Confirm your theories by consulting the stars. Jump from a past to a future perspective and discover every facet of the mysterious deaths that will be presented to you.

Dive into this dystopian universe with desaturated colors and solve the mysteries that govern the world. Perhaps you will uncover the mystery of your own death...

name: Mörk Borg Heresy Supreme
description: Mörk Borg Heresy Supreme is a doom-metal action RPG set in the world of Mörk Borg. Wretched antiheroes explore a side-scrolling, semi-procedural grimdark fantasy world, searching for a way to prevent the apocalypse or make the suffering worse.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Entropy
description: The first episode in the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series.

description: The second episode in the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series.

name: Light Switch Simulator
description: Light Switch Simulator is a casual, massively multiplayer simulation game where players engage in the ancient battle between light and dark. Players can choose from three factions, unlock light switches, and compete or collaborate online in an MMORPG environment. The game emphasizes simple mechanics of turning lights on and off, with options for single-player or multiplayer modes. Special features include private rooms, cross-platform multiplayer, and Steam achievements.

name: Inazuma Eleven Re
description: The story that started Inazuma Eleven will be revived in a remake!

description:
The ascension to penitence never ends. Strike down the enemies who stand in your way as you reveal pathways within Cvstodia to forgotten areas. Retrieve the shards and feel the stinging pain in your hands from the punishment you embraced, once more.

You can expect new quest alongside with new attacks, combos and special abilities. The DLC contains two new zones and two new bosses to fight.

name: Ayda
description: A short horror game following the mundane tasks of a woman who wakes up in the middle of the night. What she sees or hears might not always be up to par with what she remembers.

name: Project Mansion
description: In a spiraling descent into madness, a broke journalist must confront ancient enigmas, survive eldritch horrors in a damned mansion, and face his own fractured existence.

description: Sin descripción

name: Rodea Eternal
description:
This is a fangame based on Yuji Naka's game "Rodea the Sky Soldier" for the Wii.

You control a flying robot named Rodea through levels made of floating islands. You can fly freely simply by pointing and clicking. Explore or speedrun as you like, defeat enemies, and reach the goal.

name: Tuff Stuff
description:
A new adventure - inspired by Ape Escape!
Help Ronny and Bri catch these adorable stuffed animals that have suddenly come to life. FYI, they're really aggressive for some reason. So maybe not so adorable? Go get 'em.

name: Plummet Panic
description: Plummet Panic is a physics-based game with incremental upgrades. The game follows the story of a character trapped on the top floor of an office building after the elevator breaks down. Your mission is to help him reach the bottom, navigating through a series of challenging obstacles.

name: Remnant II: The Dark Horizon
description:
A return to N’Erud uncovers a mysterious place preserved in time, where alien farmlands are tended by robots for inhabitants who have long since perished. But time corrupts all, and rogue AI and robotic creations threaten at every turn while travelers search for the secrets of the colossal entity that dominates the skyline.

Features
- New storyline, dungeons and area based in the world of N’Erud
- New Archetype - The Warden
- Many items and powerful weapons that enhance gameplay
- New bosses, characters and fearsome creatures

name: Astro Bot: Stellar Speedway
description:
Free DLC that brings new speedrun levels and bots to rescue. It has weekly release schedule:

- Oct 17: Building Speed
- Oct 24: Let it Slide
- Oct 31: Spring-loaded Run
- Nov 7: Helium Heights
- Nov 14: Rising Heat

Each new level offers two brand-new Special Bots for you to rescue.

name: The Midnight Walk
description:
Embark upon The Midnight Walk in this reverent dark fantasy adventure built in clay, from the minds behind Lost in Random and Fe.

Become The Burnt One, befriend a lost lantern creature named Potboy, and use his flame to light your way through a conflicting world of wonder and horror. Survive and outsmart the many monsters eager to devour your little friend’s flame as you experience five tales of fire and darkness, featuring an incredible cast of odd characters.

Marvel at every disturbing detail in a landscape painstakingly handcrafted with real life clay and animated in a stop motion style. Fully playable in both flatscreen and with a VR headset.

name: ArcheAge Chronicles
description: Explore Auroria, a vast and vibrant world brimming with rich lore and thrilling action. ArcheAge Chronicles delivers an immersive experience that will capture players' hearts, whether they are newcomers to the setting or seasoned adventurers.

name: Lunar Remastered Collection
description: Embark on thrilling adventures within the enchanting worlds of LUNAR: Silver Star Story Complete and LUNAR 2: Eternal Blue Complete! These two cherished JRPGs have delighted gamers for generations. Now, in this definitive remastered edition, experience enhanced graphics, audio, and quality-of-life improvements that make the journey even more magical!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Radical Reptiles
description:
A powerhouse duo teams up with the Turtles for another bodacious ride! In this final content update for Shredder’s Revenge, your favorite ninja squad are joined by two fan-favorite characters from the classic 1987 TV show, Mondo Gecko and Mona Lisa! The radical reptiles are finally ready for their playable debut in a beat-em-up video game and a long-awaited reunion with the gang.

The coolest reptile on wheels, Mondo Gecko, joins the fight: use his skateboard tricks to shred through Foot soldiers and rack up extreme scores! Mondo can perform mid-air dodges with his board, making him the only character with this unique skill.

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 1 & 2 Remastered
description: Experience the epic conflict of Kain and Raziel in original form or with remastered graphics.

name: Stellar Blade x Nier: Automata
description:
In this DLC, the character “Emil’s Shop” from the action RPG NieR:Automata, produced by Square Enix and directed by Yoko Taro, appears with his item shop in the world of Stellar Blade.

“Emil’s Shop” is a mobile item shop that freely moves around the Wastelands and the Great Desert open areas.

name: Ghost of Yotei
description:
The game takes place 300 years after Ghost of Tsushima. Set in the lands surrounding Mount Yōtei, a towering peak in the heart of Ezo, an area of Japan known as Hokkaido in present day.

The area is outside the rule of Japan, and filled with sprawling grasslands, snowy tundras, and unexpected dangers.

name: Dino Crisis
description: Experience Dino Crisis originally released on the PlayStation, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain
description:
This is an emulation of the classic PS1 action-adventure title, Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain.

A dark, gothic fantasy, Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain takes gamers on an epic quest through a Vampire kingdom fraught with murder, magic and vengeance.

Accentuated with cinema-quality voice-overs, dynamic lighting effects and more than 25 minutes of revolutionary full-motion-video footage, Legacy of Kain features an engrossing storyline that invites gamers to embark on a journey through an expansive world containing more than 100 hours of intense, blood-sucking, spell-casting gameplay.
